column4: unless you have quite high-end hardware, I'm afraid flash _is_ choppy... What graphics card do you have btw? If you're using nvidia on 10.04, you should consider using the proprietary drivers instead of Noveau
darn, ok well, i have a 512 mb ati radeon x1300 agp card, open source drivers

hmm... I have little experience with ATI cards (been 5 years since last time I used one with Linux), but it might improve performance to try out the proprietary drivers there too. Although they might be more unstable, as I said, I'm not used to dealing with ATI :)
k ya, im weary, cause i have kms enabled, ill look inti it thx :)
